alerts.selectNumberField: Retrieve views, comments, and other data based on the Bilibili video link
alerts.selectGroupFieldTip: The plugin can automatically create selected fields. To map, ensure the field names in the multidimensional table match the option names. It's recommended that the 'Uploader' field type is text, 'xx Count' fields are numeric, and 'Release Time' field is a date. 'Total Interaction Count' field can involve calculations from multiple fields
